name: Powershot Pinball
summary:
Powershot Pinball's a collection of 8 games from the classic to the fantastic. Four traditional games give players hours of bumper-bashing fun while exotic takes on tables such as "Island in the Night" bring the likes. 
 
Three modes of play, including: Adventure, Time Mode and Multiplayer. 
Range of playing environments featuring both the traditional and non traditional. 
Over 6 different table styles including 
Streets of New York, Deserted Island, Shipwrecked, Factory and harbour. 
Multi-player levels featuring dual and co-operative play.
